short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension to open a new search tab and get refreshing backgrounds of the most beautiful and exotic beaches around the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Exotic Beaches Around The World Background Photos

When you’ve had your fill of history, culture and man-made wonders, sometimes sun, sea and sand is all you need. 

Use our Extension to open a new search tab and get refreshing backgrounds of the most beautiful and exotic beaches around the world. 

The new tab embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the ExoBE Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings. 

User Terms: https://weave-innovative.com/terms-of-service/
Privacy Policy: https://weave-innovative.com/privacypolicy/

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
